EmailTemplate.name: Welcome Nurture 2018.1 - Director/C-Level - Case Study and Reference
EmailTemplate.subject: See what your peers are up to
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Pivotal <[[http://pivotal.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link-1&utm_campaign=nurture-executive-2018]]> can help your organization meet increasing customer and workforce expectations, jump-start and scale your applications, manage risk, compliance requirements, reduce IT costs, and speed up new product development. See for yourself how we have helped some of the most prominent companies <[[https://pivotal.io/customers?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link-1&utm_campaign=nurture-executive-2018]]> on their digital transformation journeys.
If you have any questions, feel free to reach out to us here <[[https://pivotal.io/contact?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link-1&utm_campaign=nurture-executive-2018]]>.
Thank you, The Pivotal Team
© 2018 Pivotal Software, Inc. 875 Howard Street, Fifth Floor, San Francisco, CA 94103. Published in the USA. <[[http://info.pivotal.io/ZUA000ARC0000000V20NJI0]]> Unsubscribe <[[https://connect.pivotal.io/UnsubscribePage.html?mkt_tok=eyJpIjoiWmpkak16QTFOVGhpTmpNeSIsInQiOiJWT004WEh6MEVjajlvZG1zQlRiOXlKbkNvVDdEckZjMGZXQTh1OEhwdlpKNUVKbFhmd29SbTFEcVZGQWpzTzA1XC9reTE3MzJcLzZuWGl2bUpoXC83dncwdz09In0%253D?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link-1&utm_campaign=nurture-executive-2018]]>.
